text: {| |} RFA Wave Emperor (A 100) was a Wave-class oiler of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary built at Haverton Hill by the Furness Shipbuilding Company. ==External links== *Wave Class Oilers - website on Oilers by Jeremy Olver. Category:Wave-class oilers Category:Tankers of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary Category:1944 ships Category:Ships built on the River Tees
title: RFA Wave Emperor (A100)
